message:
[推廣datascience教學] Hi 各位資料科學愛好者，我們是每天營運的免費的IT社群  innovatist : Agile Code Camp，最近在推廣A.I 與資料科學，主要以線上udacity的課程學習理論結合實作opensource，希望能讓更多對datascience相關興趣的朋友有些幫助。不知大家有沒有興趣？是否能請邀請各位data science的前輩一起參與呢？感謝
All Data Science Course ：https://www.udacity.com/courses#!/data-science

AI
https://www.udacity.com/course/cs271

machine learning
https://www.udacity.com/course/ud120
story: 林 森泉 shared a link to the group: g0v.tw 後勤中心.
description: Browse our catalog of data science online courses. Offering classes in data analysis, statistics and data wrangling to help you reach your careers goals.
name: Data Science Course Catalog - Udacity
caption: udacity.com
